attributes.action: To ban aggresive sale over the phone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To ban aggresive sale over the phone.by doorstep callers/etc. and make the following criminal offence:
- trying to persuade to agree/sign something when person says NO
- claiming false facts [i.e. company backed by government, 'other companies has not accurate data for comparison energy offers', ...]
- ban call centres which are overseas to be used for deal with UK Customers
- ban assumption that somebody agreed for something over the phone without explicit say I Agree or similar phrase
